LanguageData.SY_BNV.BiosculpterPodReadyEffecterAlways: Biosculpter Pod Ready Effect - Always ON
Change ready effect into solid color Mutually exclusive with "always off"
Biosculpter Pod Ready Effect - Always OFF
Disable ready effect Mutually exclusive with "always on" Color settings will not have any effect
LanguageData.SY_BNV.BiosculpterPodReadyEffecterColorR: Adjust the color (red) of the blinking effect when the Biosculpter is ready Changes require reloading! (I recommend R .5, G 1, B 1)
LanguageData.SY_BNV.BiosculpterPodReadyEffecterColorG: Adjust the color (green) of the blinking effect when the Biosculpter is ready Changes require reloading! (I recommend R .5, G 1, B 1)
LanguageData.SY_BNV.BiosculpterPodReadyEffecterColorB: Adjust the color (blue) of the blinking effect when the Biosculpter is ready Changes require reloading! (I recommend R .5, G 1, B 1)
